description: Detects Obfuscated Powershell via COMPRESS OBFUSCATION
name: Invoke-Obfuscation COMPRESS OBFUSCATION
query: (((powershell.command.invocation_details:*new\-object* OR winlog.event_data.Payload:*new\-object*) AND (powershell.command.invocation_details:*text.encoding\]\:\:ascii* OR winlog.event_data.Payload:*text.encoding\]\:\:ascii*)) AND (powershell.command.invocation_details:(*system.io.compression.deflatestream* OR *system.io.streamreader*) OR winlog.event_data.Payload:(*system.io.compression.deflatestream* OR *system.io.streamreader*)) AND (powershell.command.invocation_details:*readtoend OR winlog.event_data.Payload:*readtoend))
author: Timur Zinniatullin
oscd.community
